column5: Looking for recommendations for a lodge not too far from preferably the Soo or Intl Falls. Below is my status n would appreciate any recommendations:Need a boat rental. 9.9 14’ is fine with me1 person Housekeeping planAs long as there’s a bed n shower I’m fine3 nights / 4 daysNortherns n walleyesTrying to keep it not too far from the borderThanks again

I am heading up to my camp the week of September 21st thru the 28th and I'm located about 3 and a half hours north of Sault Ste Marie.... Huge cabin on a 17 mile long reservoir called the Magpie. Pike, perch, and walleye. Cost is split the food and a little towards gas since you'd only be staying a few days.Shoot me a message if you're interested Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Check out www.birchdalelodge.com 807-227-5262 owners name is Marcel. 150 miles North of International Falls. Good fishing for Walleye, Northern Pike, Small Mouth Bass, Musky. Nice equipment and cabins.
